name: Rate Mig
description:
A simple side-scrolling game featuring a bird's migration adventure.

The bird will not survive if one of the HP/MP bars falls below zero. 

HP increases when the bird eats fish and starfish and decreases when the bird drowns or hits a giant bird.

MP increases when the bird rests on the cliffs/rocks and decreases when the bird is flying,  aka, throughout the game.

Try to find the one and only diamond to become immortal. 

Play with the up, down, and right keys.
